subtitleNullable: Ideal for building a vector similarity search and RAG playgrounds
descriptionNullable:
The dataset has been created using the [Reviews data from Amazon Fine Foods](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/snap/amazon-fine-food-reviews) 
10k customer reviews have been used by enriching it with embeddings generated via the text-embedding-ada-002 Azure OpenAI model.

The embeddings have been generated using the concatenation of Summary and Text in the Combined column:

df["combined"] = (
df.Summary.str.strip() + ": " + df.Text.str.strip()
)
title: Fine Food Reviews with embeddings
subtitle: Ideal for building a vector similarity search and RAG playgrounds
description:
The dataset has been created using the [Reviews data from Amazon Fine Foods](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/snap/amazon-fine-food-reviews) 
10k customer reviews have been used by enriching it with embeddings generated via the text-embedding-ada-002 Azure OpenAI model.

The embeddings have been generated using the concatenation of Summary and Text in the Combined column:

df["combined"] = (
df.Summary.str.strip() + ": " + df.Text.str.strip()
)
